page.title: 20Industry.
page.content: This is not an industrial area, although there are some instances of industrial activity.The industrial concerns are classified as'light' industries of the storage and distributive type.These units are mainly located along Glaisdale Drive. The industries include:building contractors, sports goods distributors,electrical appliance distributors,printers,wine distributors,industrial clothing and spring manufactures.The very edge of our grid touches the large Stanton and Staverly works which produce high quality spun pipes that are used especially to carry gas,water and sewage.Other products include iron castings and concrete pipes.
